DOC.brief_summary: To investigate the safety and efficacy of administration of eszopiclone for 4 weeks in insomnia patients.
DOC.brief_title: Investigation of the Safety and Efficacy of Eszopiclone in Insomnia Patients
DOC.criteria: 1. Insomnia participants who did not take eszopiclone before assessment 2. Participants who receive assessment by using sleep questionaries
